# OBJECT::SET_OBJECT_TAKES_DAMAGE_FROM_COLLIDING_WITH_BUILDINGS

## Summary
Marks object to take damage from colliding with buildings

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** takesDamage = true
